channel.title: World Switcher Release (Incomplete)
channel.description:
/* worldSwitcher.java * Created: Friday, December 28, 2007 * By: Mod Adam * Description: This program will allow a user to click on * a RuneScape World, and it will then open the users * browser and bring you to that World. */
This is not entirely complete. I couldn't get the world buttons to actually work and open an internet page to that website. I used a couple of Arrays, if you decompile it, you will find that they are:
[code]memberWorldID[/code] and [code]freeWorldID[/code]
I couldn't find a reasonable way (Well, I didn't know any way as a matter of fact...) to assign each number in the array a specific URL to open up to.
However, the tabs at the top work completely. At least for me. I did have someone else test in on their computer and it did not work for them. It may just be the setup, but you can change it to work for you if you want to.
If anyone wants to fix this and re-release it, go ahead. I realize that the code may be messy, but I am still learning, and made this for learning purposes only. However, I would've used it if I could've finished it :)
[I]Download Link[/I] - http://s1.uppit.com/d/89N9KZ
Thanks, Adam

item.title: World Switcher Release (Incomplete)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Taharok:

Another thing- you don’t need to call Arrays.sort() for those two integer arrays. They are already in numerical order so Arrays will change nothing in them.

I was trying to sort them for the “All Worlds” tab so they’d be in numerical order for that tab. It didn’t work though.

It takes 1 number from one, then another from the other, and so on. So it goes like:

1, 2, 3, 6, 4, 12 etc.

Read full topic

And yes, I let my friend fool around with it, and he imported things. I didn’t question him, I just left em

item.title: World Switcher Release (Incomplete)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

import java.awt.event.*;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;

Erm?

Also, couldn’t you use a drop-down box and a “Go!” button for the worlds?

Read full topic

item.title: World Switcher Release (Incomplete)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Ok then:

[code]/* worldSwitcher.java

  • Created: Friday, December 28, 2007
  • By: Mod Adam
  • Description: This program will allow a user to click on
  • a RuneScape World, and it will then open the users
  • browser and bring you to that World. */

import javax.swing.;
import javax.swing.event.;
import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.io.;
import java.util.;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;

public class worldSwitcher extends JFrame implements ActionListener {
public static void main(String[] args) {
worldSwitcher frame = new worldSwitcher();
System.out.println(“RuneScape World Switcher Started.”);
System.out.println(“Created by: Mod Adam”);

frame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
frame.setTitle("RuneScape World Switcher by Mod Adam"); //Title
frame.setSize(750, 710); //Width, Height
frame.setVisible(true);
frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
}

public worldSwitcher() {
JPanel panel = new JPanel();
JPanel panel2 = new JPanel();
JPanel panel3 = new JPanel();
ImageIcon icon = createImageIcon("");
JTabbedPane pane = new JTabbedPane();
JMenuBar menu = new JMenuBar();
JMenu file = new JMenu("File");
JMenu rs = new JMenu("RuneScape");
JMenu code = new JMenu("Programming");
JMenu use = new JMenu("Useful Links");
JMenu cred = new JMenu("Credits");
JMenuItem exit = new JMenuItem("Exit");
JMenuItem forum = new JMenuItem("Forums");
JMenuItem hs = new JMenuItem("Hiscores");
JMenuItem rhq = new JMenuItem("Rune Hq");
JMenuItem cursed = new JMenuItem("Cursed Uploads");
JMenuItem coders = new JMenuItem("CodersRus");
JMenuItem pwnd = new JMenuItem("Pwnds");
JMenuItem mopar = new JMenuItem("MoparScape");
JMenuItem mitb = new JMenuItem("Moparisthebest");
JMenuItem view = new JMenuItem("View Credits");
JMenuItem upp = new JMenuItem("Uppit");
JMenuItem paste = new JMenuItem("Pastebin");
JMenuItem home = new JMenuItem("RuneScape Homepage");

add(pane, "Center");
add(menu, "North");
panel.setLayout(new GridLayout(20, 8));
panel2.setLayout(new GridLayout(20, 8));
panel3.setLayout(new GridLayout(20, 8));

menu.add(file);
menu.add(rs);
menu.add(code);
menu.add(use);
menu.add(cred);

file.add(exit);

rs.add(home);
rs.add(forum);
rs.add(hs);
rs.add(rhq);

code.add(coders);
code.add(pwnd);
code.add(mopar);
code.add(mitb);

use.add(cursed);
use.add(upp);
use.add(paste);

cred.add(view);

pane.addTab("Free Worlds", icon, panel, "Free RuneScape Worlds (F2P)");
pane.addTab("Member Worlds", icon, panel2, "Member RuneScape Worlds (P2P)");
pane.addTab("All Worlds", icon, panel3, "All RuneScape Worlds (F2P) & (P2P)");

int[] memberWorldID = {2, 6, 9, 12, 18, 22, 23, 24, 26, 27, 28, 31, 36,
			39, 42, 44, 45, 46, 48, 53, 54, 56, 58, 59, 64,
			65, 66, 69, 70, 71, 76, 77, 78, 79, 82, 83, 84,
			88, 89, 91, 92, 97, 98, 99, 100, 103, 104, 110,
			111, 112, 114, 115, 116, 121, 124, 129, 130, 131,
			132, 137, 138, 143, 144, 145, 151, 157, 158, 159};

int[] freeWorldID = {1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, 11, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 20,
			21, 25, 29, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35, 37, 38, 40, 41, 43,
			47, 50, 51, 52, 55, 57, 61, 62, 63, 67, 68, 72, 74,
			75, 80, 81, 85, 86, 87, 90, 93, 94, 95, 96, 101,
			102, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109, 113, 117, 118, 119,
			123, 125, 126, 127, 128, 133, 134, 136, 141, 142,
			149, 152, 153, 154, 155};

Arrays.sort(memberWorldID);
Arrays.sort(freeWorldID);

int[] worlds = new int[memberWorldID.length + freeWorldID.length];
System.arraycopy(memberWorldID, 0, worlds, 0, memberWorldID.length);
System.arraycopy(freeWorldID, 0, worlds, memberWorldID.length, freeWorldID.length);

for (int x = 0; x < freeWorldID.length; x++) {
    JButton fWorld = new JButton("World " + freeWorldID[x]);
    panel.add(fWorld);
}
for (int x = 0; x < memberWorldID.length; x++) {
    JButton mWorld = new JButton("<html><font color=blue>World " + memberWorldID[x] + "</fontcolor></html>");
    panel2.add(mWorld);
}
int x = 0;
int m = 0;

while (x < memberWorldID.length && m < freeWorldID.length) {
    Arrays.sort(worlds);
    JButton afWorld = new JButton("World " + freeWorldID[m]);
    JButton amWorld = new JButton("<html><font color=blue>World " + memberWorldID[x] + "</fontcolor></html>");
    x++;
    m++;
    panel3.add(afWorld);
    panel3.add(amWorld);
}

home.addActionListener(this);
paste.addActionListener(this);
upp.addActionListener(this);
cursed.addActionListener(this);
pwnd.addActionListener(this);
mitb.addActionListener(this);
mopar.addActionListener(this);
rhq.addActionListener(this);
coders.addActionListener(this);
hs.addActionListener(this);
forum.addActionListener(this);
exit.addActionListener(this);

}

protected static ImageIcon createImageIcon(String path) {
java.net.URL imgURL = worldSwitcher.class.getResource(path);
    if (imgURL != null) {
        return new ImageIcon(imgURL);
    } else {
        //System.err.println("Couldn't find file: " + path);
        return null;
    }
}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) { //I have yet to make Worlds open... I honestly don't know how.
try {
        if(e.getActionCommand().equals("RuneScape Homepage")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.runescape.com");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("CodersRus")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.codersrus.org/");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Forums")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Hiscores")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://hiscore.runescape.com/hiscores.ws");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Rune Hq")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.runehq.com/");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Cursed Uploads")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://choobisle.no-ip.info:8080/index.php");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Pwnds")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.pwnds.info/");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("MoparScape")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Moparisthebest")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Uppit")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.uppit.com/");
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Exit")) {
            System.exit(1);
    }
    else if(e.getActionCommand().equals("Pastebin")) {
            Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler http://www.pastebin.ca/");
    }
}
    catch(Exception exception) { }
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
